title: Justice?
body: <a href="http://www.wokr13.tv/news/local/story.aspx?content_id=5CC92674-9F24-4E00-B12A-BA2151EF91B3">Danny</a> <a href="http://www.10nbc.com/news.asp?template=item&story_id=11143">Hopkins</a> was finally arrested for murdering a friend of a friend last October.  106mph in a 30mph zone ?!?! - all thanks to the black box in his Caddy.  Of course this murderer's attorney is arguing that his client's right to privacy should eliminate the black box evidence.  Aside from the eyewitnesses, fibers from his coat were found on the airbag.  How can this <a href="http://news.google.com/news?q=%22Danny%20Hopkins%22">asshole</a> (and his asshole attorney) live with himself? (<a href="http://video.wokr13.com/viewer/viewerpage.php?Art_ID=21355">video</a>)

bodyNavItems.text: Bush To Iraqi Militants: 'Please Stop Bringing It On'
